about_the_game:
You're the mastermind behind a team of lovable yet fierce battlers, each with their own abilities. From crafty wizards with a twinkle in their eyes to valiant knights and enchanting creatures, your squad is as charming as it is formidable. Imagine moving them across a unique hexagonal grid, where every step is a chance to outmaneuver your opponents and claim victory.

But here's the catch - it's all about smart moves and smarter resource management. You've got to think on your feet, juggling energy and movement points to pull off those game-changing moves. Whether it's unleashing a powerful attack, calling in reinforcements, or nimbly navigating the battlefield, your decisions shape the course of the clash.

And the ultimate goal? To outsmart your opponent and take down their king. With nine different pieces to spawn, each with their own cost, pattern, and skills, the possibilities are endless. You'll need to adapt your strategy, exploit weaknesses, and sometimes even turn the tide of battle when the odds are against you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or newer

short_description: Assemble your adorable team of battlers, navigate the unique hexagonal grid, and outsmart opponents in thrilling battles. Command a colorful cast of whimsical game pieces with special abilities. Manage resources wisely, adapt your strategies, and seize victory.
